title: @Riot About to Hit 1000 Winsâ€¦  Anyone wanna help? :)
body:
Heyyo! I just recently won my 999th normal game, and I could never be happier! As you all know, 1000 wins is a pretty big milestone (at least in my opinion anyways) and I know that Riot happens to like to play with people who are going to be hitting that big win. I currently have 2 friends that will be already joining me, so I got 2 slots open for any awesome Rioters that want to experience my 1000th win with me. Can't wait, however I can't play during the weekday afternoons due to school so if you guys want to join, I hate to say it but it would either have to be sometime soon or sometime after 3:30 CST.

Thanks Riot for possibly joining me on the experience, and if not, I totally get it. You guys have busy lives. :)

replies.body:
Heya! 

Would you be free to play tomorrow at 4 PM PST, so 6 PM your time?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tyFE6sK6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-09T01:25:51.280+0000)
>
> Heya! 
> 
> Would you be free to play tomorrow at 4 PM PST, so 6 PM your time?

Able to play now seeing as it's about 4 PM PST.  I'll wait 20 minutes for you if you are still there. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tyFE6sK6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-09T01:25:51.280+0000)
>
> Heya! 
> 
> Would you be free to play tomorrow at 4 PM PST, so 6 PM your time?

Also yes, I would be able to play then.  :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tyFE6sK6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-09T01:25:51.280+0000)
>
> Heya! 
> 
> Would you be free to play tomorrow at 4 PM PST, so 6 PM your time?

I can, but I'm mostly likely going to play with my friends right now for my 1000th win I believe.  Would you still be willing to play if it's not exactly my 1000th win?  I do apologize for the inconvenience, my friends really wanted to play with me.  Hope you are still willing to possibly play.  <3
Well I think we lost this game lol.  Any chance you could do a game quick now?
